title: Calories in M&Ms
meta_description: Learn calories in m and ms with a standard 28g serving breakdown, including carbs, sugars, fat, protein, and full nutrition details for quick reference.
assumptions: Plain milk chocolate M&Ms; standard 1 oz (28g) serving; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety (plain, peanut, etc.), brand, and serving size. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A 28g serving of plain M&Ms provides about 140 calories and 17g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 10g to a trail mix portion

faqs.q: How many calories in 28g of M&Ms?
What are the carbs in M&Ms?
faqs.a: A 28g serving has 17g total carbs, including 16g sugars and 1g fiber.

faqs.q: How much fat is in M&Ms?
faqs.a: 7g total fat per 28g, with 4g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Calories in peanut M&Ms vs plain?
faqs.a: Peanut M&Ms have about 30-60 more calories per 100g due to added peanuts.
